hoatChat: Betamethason dipropionat; Gentamicin (dưới dạng Gentamycin sulphat); Clotrimazol
dongGoi: Hộp 1 tuýp 10 g; hộp 1 tuýp 20 g
taDuoc: Emulcire 61 WL  2659, macrogol cetostearyl ether, parafin lỏng, propylen glycol, methyl parahydroxybenzoat, propyl  parahydroxybenzoat, natri dihydro  phosphat, nước tinh khiết
